Manager

Class HallManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager.DataManager
      • Manager.HallManager

  • public class HallManager
extends DataManager
    Represents the HallManager of MoblimaApp that handles the creating, updating and removing of halls.
    Since:
    2017-11-16

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HallManager getInstance()
        This method to ensure that only one instance of HallManager is created so that if no such Object is created yet, it will create a new HallManager object else it will return the existing created HallManager object.
        Returns:
        instance The instance of HallManager that is already created.

      • checkHallExistence

        public boolean checkHallExistence(java.lang.String hallCode)
        This method is to check if the hall based on the inputed hhallCode is already in the hall list before creating a new hall
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The inputed hallCode for checking of existence of hall since hallCode is unique to each hall.
        Returns:
        true if the hall exists in the hall list already, else false.

      • createHall

        public void createHall(java.lang.String hallClass,
                       java.lang.String hallCode,
                       java.lang.String cineplex,
                       int capacity,
                       int rows,
                       int columns)
        This method creates a new hall based on the inputed configuration of a hall (i.e. hallClass, hallCode, cineplex, capacity, rows, and columns).
        Parameters:
        hallClass - The selected hallClass (e.g. Silver).
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode (e.g. AMG) in which the first letter allows us to identify which cineplex (e.g. 'A' represents cineplex.AMK which is at Ang Mo Kio).
        cineplex - The selected cineplex to add the new hall to.
        capacity - The selected capacity for the hall layout.
        rows - The number of rows for the hall layout based on the selected capacity.
        columns - The number of columns for the hall layout based on the selected capacity.

      • updateCapacity

        public boolean updateCapacity(java.lang.String hallCode,
                              int capacity)
        This method is to modify the capacity of the hall layout by taking in the hallCode which identifies the hall and the inputed capacity value.
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode to identify the hall to modify.
        capacity - The inputed capacity to set the number of seats.
        Returns:
        true if updating is successful, else false.

      • updateLayout

        public boolean updateLayout(java.lang.String hallCode,
                            int rows,
                            int columns)
        This method is to modify the layout of the hall based on the hallCode, rows and columns
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode to identify the hall to modify.
        rows - The inputed number of rows.
        columns - The inputed number of columns.
        Returns:
        true if updating is successful, else false.

      • updateClassType

        public boolean updateClassType(java.lang.String hallCode,
                               java.lang.String hallClass)
        This method is to modify the class type based on hallCode and hallClass.
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode to identify the hall to modify.
        hallClass - The inputed hallClass.
        Returns:
        true if updating is successful, else false.

      • removeHall

        public boolean removeHall(java.lang.String hallCode)
        This method is to remove an existing hall based on the hallCode.
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode to identify the hall to modify.
        Returns:
        true if updating is successful, else false.

      • updateClassRate

        public void updateClassRate(java.lang.String hallClass,
                            java.lang.Double rate)
        This method is to modify the class rate based on the hallClass and rate.
        Parameters:
        hallClass - The inputed hallClass.
        rate - The new inputed rate to change to.

      • getClassRateHash

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getClassRateHash()
        This method is to get a hash map consisting of the hall class and its corresponding rate.
        Returns:
        hashMap Hash Map of the class and rate.

      • getHallList

        public java.util.List<Hall> getHallList()
        This method is to get the list of all the hall objects.
        Returns:
        hallList List of the hall objects.

      • getHallObject

        public Hall getHallObject(java.lang.String hallCode)
        This method is to get a specific hall object from the hall list by searching a match using the inputed hallCode
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique inputed hallCode to identify the hall to modify.
        Returns:
        Hall The hall object corresponding to the hallCode.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Write all the updated hallList into the file path.
        Returns:
        true if saving is successful, else false.
